name: Berry Careful
description:
This is game was made for BenBonk's Game Jam #1

Wanted to try making a chill game for once and focused on art

The Theme was Trust No One

My interpretation of it was that at the beginning you don't trust anything and you have to take a leap 

In this game you are are walking in a forest foraging berries be careful as some berry may look delicous and can actually harm you hence you got to build trust with experience

Following  would be very appreciated :D
